trans-unit.source: Provides the features required to support both complex and simple scenarios when binding to a data source.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce le funzionalità necessarie per supportare scenari semplici e complessi durante l'associazione a un'origine dati.

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented by the <xref:System.Data.DataView> class.
trans-unit.target: Questa interfaccia viene implementata dalla <xref:System.Data.DataView>classe.</xref:System.Data.DataView>

trans-unit.source: Implementation of a method should exhibit the same behavior as the implementation of that method in the <xref:System.Data.DataView> class.
trans-unit.target: Implementazione di un metodo deve presentare lo stesso comportamento dell'implementazione di tale metodo nella <xref:System.Data.DataView>classe.</xref:System.Data.DataView>

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ApplySort%2A> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.RemoveSort%2A> methods, you should raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> event with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Quando si chiama il <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ApplySort%2A>o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.RemoveSort%2A>metodi, è necessario generare un <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>evento con il <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType>enumerazione.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.RemoveSort%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ApplySort%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew%2A> method, you should raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> event with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> enumeration carrying the appropriate index.
trans-unit.target: Quando si chiama il <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew%2A>(metodo), è necessario generare un <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>evento con il <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType>enumerazione l'indice appropriato.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: The added row is in a state where pressing the ESC on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control can remove the new row.
trans-unit.target: La riga aggiunta è in uno stato in cui premendo il tasto ESC per un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllo è possibile rimuovere la nuova riga.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Raising the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> event with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> enumeration a second time on this row indicates that the item is now a row not in the "new" state.
trans-unit.target: Generazione di <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>evento con il <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType>enumerazione una seconda volta su questa riga indica che l'elemento è ora una riga non nello stato di "new".</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: When you remove an item or call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.CancelEdit%2A> method on a new row (if that row implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>), you should raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> event with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> enumeration carrying the appropriate index.
trans-unit.target: Quando si rimuove un elemento o una chiamata di <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.CancelEdit%2A>metodo in una nuova riga (se la riga implementi <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>), è necessario generare un <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>evento con il <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType>enumerazione l'indice appropriato.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.CancelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to the indexes used for searching.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> per gli indici utilizzati per la ricerca.

trans-unit.source: The list must support this method.
trans-unit.target: L'elenco deve supportare questo metodo.

trans-unit.source: However, support for this method can be a nonoperation.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, il supporto per questo metodo non può essere un'operazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to add to the indexes used for searching.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> per aggiungere gli indici utilizzati per la ricerca.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new item to the list.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un nuovo elemento all'elenco.

trans-unit.source: This method is supported only if <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A> is `true`; otherwise, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è supportato solo se <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A>è `true`; in caso contrario, un <xref:System.NotSupportedException>viene generata un'eccezione.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: Implementing this method means that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> list must understand the type of objects to add to the list and must understand how to create a new instance of that type.
trans-unit.target: Implementazione di questo metodo indica che il <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>elenco deve comprendere il tipo di oggetti da aggiungere all'elenco e deve comprendere come creare una nuova istanza di quel tipo.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a collection of `myCustomer` objects, the AddNew method should add a new `myCustomer` object to the list.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si dispone di una raccolta di `myCustomer` oggetti, il metodo AddNew aggiunge un nuovo `myCustomer` oggetto all'elenco.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the objects in this list implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> interface, calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.CancelEdit%2A> method should discard an object, not add it to the list, when the object was created using the AddNew method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se implementano gli oggetti in questo elenco il <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>interfaccia, la chiamata di <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.CancelEdit%2A>metodo è necessario annullare un oggetto, non aggiungerlo all'elenco, quando l'oggetto è stato creato utilizzando il metodo AddNew.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.CancelEdit%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>

trans-unit.source: The object should only be added to the list when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto deve essere aggiunto solo all'elenco quando il <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo viene chiamato.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must sychronize the object and the list carefully.
trans-unit.target: Di conseguenza, è necessario sincronizzare l'oggetto e l'elenco con attenzione.

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, you should raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> event with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> enumeration carrying the appropriate index.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene chiamato questo metodo, è necessario generare un <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>evento con il <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType>enumerazione l'indice appropriato.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: The added row is in a state where hitting Esc on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control can remove the new row.
trans-unit.target: La riga aggiunta è in uno stato in cui premendo Esc una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllo è possibile rimuovere la nuova riga.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Raising the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> event with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> enumeration a second time on this row indicates that the item is now a normal row (not in new state).
trans-unit.target: Generazione di <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>evento con il <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType>enumerazione una seconda volta su questa riga indica che l'elemento è ora una riga normale (non in stato nuovo).</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: The item added to the list.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento aggiunto all'elenco.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew*>is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew*>

trans-unit.source: Gets whether you can update items in the list.
trans-unit.target: Indica se è possibile aggiornare gli elementi dell'elenco.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if you can update the items in the list; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se è possibile aggiornare gli elementi nell'elenco. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether you can add items to the list using <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew*>.
trans-unit.target: Indica se è possibile aggiungere elementi all'elenco utilizzando <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew*>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `true`, this property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>o <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>è `true`, questa proprietà restituisce `false`.</xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if you can add items to the list using <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew*>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se è possibile aggiungere elementi all'elenco utilizzando <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew*>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew*>

trans-unit.source: Gets whether you can remove items from the list, using <xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove*> or <xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt*>.
trans-unit.target: Indica se è possibile rimuovere elementi dall'elenco, utilizzando <> </> *> o <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `true`, this property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>o <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>è `true`, questa proprietà restituisce `false`.</xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If AllowRemove returns `false`, <xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName> throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > AllowRemove se restituisce `false` <xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Genera un <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if you can remove items from the list; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se è possibile rimuovere elementi dall'elenco. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the list based on a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> and a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ordina l'elenco in base a un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> e <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If items are added or removed, these items are placed in the order of the sort.
trans-unit.target: Se gli elementi vengono aggiunti o rimossi, questi elementi vengono inseriti nell'ordine dell'ordinamento.

trans-unit.source: This method is supported if <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A> is `true`; otherwise, this method throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è supportato se <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A>è `true`; in caso contrario, questo metodo genera un <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to sort by.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> eseguire l'ordinamento.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*>is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the row that has the given <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'indice della riga con il determinato <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method will select the first row where the value of the `property` parameter equals the value of the `key` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo verrà selezionata la prima riga in cui il valore della `property` parametro è uguale al valore del `key` parametro.

trans-unit.source: This method is supported if <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSearching%2A> is `true`, otherwise this method throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è supportato se <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSearching%2A>è `true`, in caso contrario questo metodo genera un <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSearching%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to search on.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> eseguire la ricerca.

trans-unit.source: The value of the `property` parameter to search for.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di `property` parametro da cercare.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row that has the given <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'indice della riga con il determinato <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSearching*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSearching*>is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSearching*>

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the items in the list are sorted.
trans-unit.target: Indica se l'ordinamento degli elementi nell'elenco.

trans-unit.source: This property is supported if <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A> is `true`; otherwise, this property throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è supportata se <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A>è `true`; in caso contrario, questa proprietà genera un <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IsSorted returns `true`, items are added or removed in the order of the sort.
trans-unit.target: Se la proprietà IsSorted restituisce `true`, gli elementi vengono aggiunti o rimossi sequenza di ordinamento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ApplySort*> has been called and <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.RemoveSort*> has not been called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se <> </> *> è stato chiamato e <> </> *> non è stato chiamato; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*>is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the list changes or an item in the list changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando viene modificato l'elenco o un elemento nell'elenco.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised only if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsChangeNotification%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento viene generato solo se il <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsChangeNotification%2A>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsChangeNotification%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> from the indexes used for searching.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> dagli indici utilizzati per la ricerca.

trans-unit.source: The list must support this method.
trans-unit.target: L'elenco deve supportare questo metodo.

trans-unit.source: However, support for this method can be a nonoperation.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, il supporto per questo metodo non può essere un'operazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to remove from the indexes used for searching.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> per rimuovere gli indici utilizzati per la ricerca.

trans-unit.source: Removes any sort applied using <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ApplySort*>.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove qualsiasi ordinamento applicato tramite <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ApplySort*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ApplySort*>

trans-unit.source: This property is supported if <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A> is `true`; otherwise, this property throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è supportata se <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A>è `true`; in caso contrario, questa proprietà genera un <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call this method, you should raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> event with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Quando si chiama questo metodo, è necessario generare un <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>evento con il <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType>enumerazione.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*>is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the direction of the sort.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la direzione dell'ordinamento.

trans-unit.source: This property is supported if <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A> is `true`; otherwise, this property throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è supportata se <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A>è `true`; in caso contrario, questa proprietà genera un <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*>is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that is being used for sorting.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> che viene utilizzato per l'ordinamento.

trans-unit.source: This property is supported if <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A> is `true`; otherwise, this property throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è supportata se <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A>è `true`; in caso contrario, questa proprietà genera un <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that is being used for sorting.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> che viene utilizzato per l'ordinamento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*>is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*>

trans-unit.source: Gets whether a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged"></xref> event is raised when the list changes or an item in the list changes.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene se un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged"> </xref> evento viene generato quando viene modificato l'elenco o un elemento nell'elenco.

trans-unit.source: Objects in the list must notify the list when they change, so the list can raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Gli oggetti dell'elenco devono segnalare all'elenco quando vengono modificati, pertanto l'elenco può generare un <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>evento.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged"></xref> event is raised when the list changes or when an item changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged"> </xref> evento viene generato quando viene modificato l'elenco o un elemento; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the list supports searching using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find*> method.
trans-unit.target: Indica se l'elenco supporta la ricerca utilizzando il <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find*>metodo.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list supports searching using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find*> method; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elenco supporta la ricerca con il <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find*>metodo; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find*>

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the list supports sorting.
trans-unit.target: Indica se l'elenco supporta l'ordinamento.

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, then <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.IsSorted%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortProperty%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortDirection%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ApplySort%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.RemoveSort%2A> are supported.
trans-unit.target: Se questa proprietà è `true`, quindi <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.IsSorted%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortProperty%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortDirection%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ApplySort%2A>, e <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.RemoveSort%2A>sono supportati.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.RemoveSort%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ApplySort%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortDirection%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortProperty%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.IsSorted%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list supports sorting; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elenco supporta l'ordinamento. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
